body_html: Sorry, I should have thought of this earlier, but it appears to me that ColorTransform is a special case of tf.tensordot -- could you simply use that in your python conversion functions? Then we save ourselves an extra kernel to build, test, and maintain.

body: Sorry, I should have thought of this earlier, but it appears to me that ColorTransform is a special case of `tf.tensordot` -- could you simply use that in your python conversion functions? Then we save ourselves an extra kernel to build, test, and maintain.
